root.message: The REFERENCES field for indicator 8-4-2, translated into en
root.data: References EUROSTAT (2013). Economy-wide material flow accounts. Compilation guide 2013. Wiedmann, T., H. Schandl, M. Lenzen, D. Moran, S. Suh, J. West, K. Kanemoto, (2013) The Material Footprint of Nations, Proc. Nat. Acad. Sci. Online before print. Lenzen, M., Moran, D., Kanemoto, K., Geschke, A. (2013) Building Eora: A global Multi-regional Input-Output Database at High Country and Secotr Resolution, Economic Systems Research, 25:1, 20-49.
